EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday, March 26th at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Thursday, March 26 in Palo Alto, California. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Thursday, March 26, 2015 8:00am - 3:00pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/paloalto>
Pivotal Office 3495 Deer Creek Rd Palo Alto, CA 94304
Parking Information Complimentary Valet and Self-parking will be available at the workshop venue.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*A USB drive with a VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS?
Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or via cell at 408-425-9302 <tel:408-425-9302>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
